imdb.title: Litchi DE Hikari Club
imdb.plot: A group of school age boys create a robot and plan world domination.

episodes.title: Death Penalty in the Light Club
episodes.plot: The Light Club tries to come up with a punishment worse than death.

episodes.title: Modifications in the Light Club
episodes.plot: Zera wants to modify Lychee so he can serve another purpose after capturing Kanon. However, all suggestions-that vary from having him playing sports or as a car-are not useful.

episodes.title: Patents in the Light Club
episodes.plot: Dentaku realizes that Lychee operating on lychee fruit is a very sustainable feature so he proposes that they patent its system to make money.

episodes.title: Investigations in the Light Club
episodes.plot: The club considers Kanon too beautiful to be subject to "treat", they want to investigate it. They order Lychee to abduct a female to compare to Kanon. He does so, but returns with a middle aged woman.

episodes.title: Band in the Light Club
episodes.plot: Zera decides to create a rock band.

episodes.title: Fuel in the Light Club
episodes.plot: The group wonders if Lychee really only runs at lychee fruit. They try to feed him other things, eventually Lychee develops culinary skills much to Zera's horror.

episodes.title: Beach in the Light Club
episodes.plot: Zero invites the club to the beach, but everyone is embarrassed to wear the swim suits that he gave them.

episodes.title: Loyalty in the Light Club
episodes.plot: Zera requests to know what the members are ready to offer as a sacrifice for the club, because Nico gave his eye to Lychee. They all offer useless and bizarre things ranging from glasses to oral sex.
